com.badlogic.gdx.audio
Interface Sound

public interface Sound

A sound is a short audio clip that can be played numerous times. it's completely loaded into memory. Call the Sound.dispose() method when you're done using the Sound.

Author:
mzechner

Method Summary
 void dispose()
          Releases all the resources.
 void play()
          Plays the sound, you can call this repeatedly to play the same sound a couple of times with a bit of lag introduced.
 

Method Detail

play

void play()
Plays the sound, you can call this repeatedly to play the same sound a couple of times with a bit of lag introduced.

dispose

void dispose()
Releases all the resources.
